title: Background Image Generator
generateImageTooltip: Generate images using the same prompt
generateWithNewPromptTooltip: Generates a unique prompt for each image
uniquePromptCountTooltip: Number of images to generate, each with a unique prompt
samePromptCountTooltip: Number of images to generate using the same prompt
helperMessage: You can use your own lyrics and album art here, or press "Add Subtitles" to fetch from Genius

error.quotaExceeded: Quota exceeded. Check your plan and billing.
error.rateLimited: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait and try again.
error.unauthorized: Unauthorized: API key invalid or missing.
error.forbidden: Access forbidden. Check billing/quota or model access.
error.badRequest: Invalid request. Adjust prompt or album art and try again.
error.payloadTooLarge: Request too large. Try a smaller album image.
error.unsupportedMediaType: Unsupported image type. Please upload PNG or JPEG.
error.serverError: Service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
error.apiKeyMissing: Gemini API key not set. Please set it in settings.
error.cors: Could not load album art due to CORS. Upload the image instead.
error.noImageReturned: No image was returned. Try again or simplify the prompt.
error.noPromptReturned: No prompt was returned. Try again later.
error.network: Network error. Check your connection and try again.
